Type Definitions

ApiOptions

Source:
  • index.mjs, line 20
Properties:
Name Type Description
type string expected data type
headers Object headers to be send with each request
retry number how many times should request try to get a successful response. Can be overridden with retryPolicy. 1 = no retry, 2 = one retry, etc.
retryInterval number time between retries. Can be overriden with retryWaitPolicy
retryPolicy function function that decides if request should be retried
retryWaitPolicy function function that decides how much time to wait before next retry
timeout number timeout for each request
totalTimeout number total timeout in which all, including retried requests should be fulfilled (this includes wait time between, so timeout=100, wait=200, totalTimeout=350 means that retry will have only 50ms)
Type:
  • Object
